Literature.Title: Development of a novel antimicrobial peptide, AG-30, with angiogenic properties.
Literature.Author: Nishikawa T, Nakagami H, Maeda A, Morishita R, Miyazaki N, Ogawa T, Tabata Y, Kikuchi Y, Hayashi H, Tatsu Y, Yumoto N, Tamai K, Tomono K, Kaneda Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=40µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=20µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data)
